Step.name: If
Step.Calculation: LeftWords ( GetRepetition ( Contacts::Email Placeholder ; Get ( ScriptParameter ) ) ; 1 ) = "Office" or LeftWords ( GetRepetition ( Contacts::Email Placeholder ; Get ( ScriptParameter ) ) ; 1 ) = "Personal"

To.Calculation: Contacts::Name for Labels & " <" & MiddleWords ( GetRepetition ( Contacts::Email Placeholder ; Get ( ScriptParameter ) ) ; 2 ; 999 ) & ">"

Message.Calculation: "Dear " & Contacts::Name for Labels & ",¶¶¶¶" & "Best Regards¶¶" & Get ( UserName )

Step.name: Else If
Step.Calculation: LeftWords ( GetRepetition ( Contacts::Email Placeholder ; Get ( ScriptParameter ) ) ; 1 ) = Contacts::Video App
